targets.expr: sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", container!="",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (namespace)
sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase!="Running", namespace=~"$namespace"} and kube_pod_status_phase{phase!="Succeeded", namespace=~"$namespace"}) OR on() vector(0)
